body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & Multimedia              Exhibits - View a series of exhibits at various sites along the Trail of Tears. Take the virtual journey and then visit the site.             Watch stories of hardship, endurance, love, and loss on the Trail of Tears.             Listen to Janelle Adair, Miss Cherokee 1999-2000, share the story of the corn-bead necklace.             Photo Gallery - Go here to see and download Trail of Tears images
title: Trail Of Tears National Historic Trail: Photos & Multimedia
